Donor Search

Donor and Team Search component. Can be set to search from single TeamRaiser or use Primary Event Type to pull from several TeamRaisers.

Examples

Search set to pull from specific TeamRaiser using frId. Result list set to showBadges and setting sortAscending to false to sort descending.

<div donor-team-search fr-id="1070" show-badges="true" sort-ascending="false"></div>

Search set to pull from several TeamRaisers using eventType. Result list set to only show 2 results at a time and show pagination.

<div donor-team-search event-type="Custom Registration" size-limit="2"></div>
